actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A joint resolution to postpone the effective date of an order of the Federal Power Commission reducing the priority of natural gas used for irrigation pumping.

summary.text: Postpones the effective date of an order of the Federal Power Commission reducing the priority of natural gas used for irrigation until the Commission holds hearings with respect to such order in each State affected and reports to Congress on the hearings with recommendations. Directs that the postponement shall continue for 90 calendar days of continuous session of Congress following the date on which such report is submitted to Congress.

titles.title: A joint resolution to postpone the effective date of an order of the Federal Power Commission reducing the priority of natural gas used for irrigation pumping.
